channel.description: Week 6 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 5 Due 7 PM Wed: Week 5 Questions 11:59 PM Thur: Speaker: Sarah Allen 3:30 PM Next Week: Lab 6 Monday 7 PM Lab 5 Grading SSH to Frontend SSH to Backend Firewall, Date/Time Apache, DNS, HTTPS Speaker: Sarah Allen System Administrator McCown-Gordon Former CIS 527 Student Helpdesk & Support Lab 6 File Servers Drive Mappings Application Servers Working Web Apps Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs.
